#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long t,i,n,j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    cin>>n;
	    long ar[n];
	    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	    cin>>ar[i];
	    sort(ar,ar+n);
	    j=n-1;
	    for(i=0;i<n/2;i++)
	    {
	        cout<<ar[j]<<" "<<ar[i]<<" ";
	        j--;
	    }
	    if(n%2!=0)
	    cout<<ar[i]<<endl;
	    else
	    cout<<endl;
	    
	}
	return 0;
}
